highLevel.finalResolution: No majority high-level plan reached within configured rounds.

implementation.finalResolution: Plan adopted; proceed with phased rollout, implementation APIs, and verification suites.

winningMotion.motionTitle: Approve detailed implementation plan for distributed batch platform
winningMotion.motionText: Approve the concrete plan covering REST/gRPC/WebSocket APIs, statestore schema, stateless quota-aware scheduler with 30s etcd leases and /v1/nodepools ETA, controller-led retries/checkpoints, agent staging/log relay, failure monitoring (quota drift, pool exhaustion, retry storms), and four rollout phases with CI chaos tests.
winningMotion.decisionIfPass: Plan adopted; proceed with phased rollout, implementation APIs, and verification suites.

finalResolution: Plan adopted; proceed with phased rollout, implementation APIs, and verification suites.
